title: Underground River Temple Adventure #24
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Flooded Antechamber
rooms.description: You stand in a partially flooded chamber where an underground river flows through ancient stone channels. The walls are covered in moss and carved with mysterious glyphs. Water drips from stalactites above, echoing in the darkness. A stone altar rises from the shallow water, and a sealed door blocks the way forward.

items.name: carved stone altar
items.description: An ancient altar covered in water worn carvings and symbols
items.text: Altar inscription: 'The River Keeper guards these halls. The sacred year of founding: 842. The three priests who built this temple: Keeper Theron, Keeper Mira, Keeper Zane.'

items.name: waterproof chest
items.description: A sealed chest designed to protect its contents from water damage

items.name: ancient temple scroll
items.description: A preserved scroll containing temple history
items.text: Temple Record: This sacred place was founded in the year 842 by three devoted keepers. Keeper Theron maintained the water channels. Keeper Mira preserved our knowledge in the sacred library. Keeper Zane protected the holy relic in the inner sanctum.

items.name: tarnished copper key
items.description: An ancient copper key with water damage and patina

items.name: stone storage cabinet
items.description: A cabinet carved directly into the temple wall

items.name: ceremonial dagger
items.description: A bronze dagger used in ancient temple ceremonies

items.name: keeper's journal
items.description: A leather bound journal protected by wax sealing
items.text: Journal of Keeper Theron: I am the guardian of the water channels. My duty is to maintain the flow that gives this temple life. The sacred library holds our wisdom, and the inner sanctum protects our most precious relic.

items.name: moss covered alcove
items.description: A small alcove in the wall hidden behind hanging moss

items.name: temple medallion
items.description: A silver medallion engraved with the temple symbol

items.name: sealed stone door
items.description: A heavy stone door blocking passage deeper into the temple. Vines have grown over the lock mechanism.

rooms.name: Sacred Library
rooms.description: A vast chamber with stone shelves carved into the walls, holding countless scrolls and tablets. The underground river flows through a channel in the floor, its gentle sound filling the space. Ancient knowledge surrounds you. Statues of the three founding keepers stand watch, and a massive door leads to the inner sanctum.

items.name: statue of Keeper Theron
items.description: A stone statue depicting a robed figure holding a water vessel
items.text: Plaque: 'Keeper Theron - Guardian of the Water Channels. He who maintains the sacred flow that sustains all life within these halls.'

items.name: statue of Keeper Mira
items.description: A statue showing a figure holding an open book
items.text: Plaque: 'Keeper Mira - Preserver of Knowledge. She who guards the wisdom of ages in the sacred library.'

items.name: statue of Keeper Zane
items.description: A statue of a stern figure holding a staff
items.text: Plaque: 'Keeper Zane - Protector of the Relic. He who stands eternal vigil over the holy treasure in the inner sanctum.'

items.name: collection of ancient scrolls
items.description: Hundreds of scrolls containing temple records and rituals

items.name: stone prophecy tablet
items.description: A tablet with an important prophecy carved into it
items.text: Prophecy: 'When the River Keeper returns, they must prove their knowledge to enter the inner sanctum. Know the guardian of waters, the keeper of wisdom, and the protector of the sacred relic.'

items.name: stone reading desk
items.description: A desk with compartments for organizing scrolls

items.name: translation guide
items.description: A guide for understanding the temple's ancient language
items.text: Translation Notes: The inner sanctum door asks three questions in the old tongue. They ask about the roles of the three keepers: who guards the water, who preserves knowledge, and who protects the relic.

items.name: ceremonial stone basin
items.description: A basin filled with clear water from the underground river

items.name: ornate golden key
items.description: A beautifully crafted key that gleams despite its age

items.name: inner sanctum door
items.description: A magnificent door carved with intricate patterns. Three questions are inscribed in the ancient language, with a translation plate beside them.

password_questions.question: Who guards the water channels?
password_questions.hint: Check the statues and their plaques in the library

password_questions.question: Where is knowledge preserved?
password_questions.hint: Read the temple scroll and keeper's journal

password_questions.question: Who protects the holy relic?
password_questions.hint: The statues tell you about each keeper's role

rooms.name: Inner Sanctum
rooms.description: You have reached the heart of the Underground River Temple! The chamber glows with an ethereal blue light emanating from a crystal formation where the river's source emerges from the rock. On a pedestal in the center rests the Sacred Aquamarine, a massive gemstone that pulses with the power of the underground waters. Ancient murals depicting the temple's glory cover the walls. A shaft of natural light from above reveals a passage to freedom.

items.name: Sacred Aquamarine
items.description: A magnificent blue gemstone the size of a human head, radiating mystical energy and the essence of the underground river

items.name: ornate crystal pedestal
items.description: A pedestal of pure crystal holding the sacred gemstone, surrounded by flowing water

items.name: ancient wall murals
items.description: Elaborate paintings showing the temple's construction and the three keepers
items.text: The murals depict the founding of the temple in 842, showing Keeper Theron channeling the underground river, Keeper Mira establishing the library, and Keeper Zane placing the Sacred Aquamarine in the sanctum. The final panel shows a figure ascending to the surface through a natural shaft.

items.name: golden offering bowl
items.description: A bowl filled with ancient coins and precious offerings

rooms.win_message: You have discovered the Sacred Aquamarine and reached the inner sanctum of the Underground River Temple! As you lift the ancient gemstone, the temple acknowledges you as the true River Keeper. The waters glow brightly, and a hidden passage opens above, allowing you to ascend to the surface with the sacred treasure. The temple's mysteries are yours, and you emerge victorious into the light of day. You win!
